info.description: API contains operations on Broker External Alias resource.
info.title: Broker External Alias

post.description:
Create one or more Broker external aliases to a maximum of 100 per request.
Required fields:-brokerTicker,brokerExternalOrganisationId,externalAlias.
Users needs to have permissions under permType='brkrAka' for using this API.

post.description:
Filters broker external aliases based on a single broker ticker(for basic filtering) or any combination of the following filters : 
List of broker tickers, broker type and broker entity (for advance filtering).

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsActionType.description:
Represents type of validation being performed.

 - ACTION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved value.
 - ACTION_TYPE_CREATE: Validation for create request.
 - ACTION_TYPE_UPDATE: Validation for update request.

enumsFilterType.description:
Represents type of filter being performed.

 - FILTER_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved value.
 - FILTER_TYPE_BASIC: Option for Basic filter- Filters Data on the basis of a single ticker and/or loadDefunct flag.
 - FILTER_TYPE_ADVANCE: Option for Advance filter - Filters data on the basis of advanced filters like list of tickers, BrokerType, entity , etc.
 - FILTER_TYPE_ID: Option for filter on list of id's- Filters data on the basis of list of id's.

rpcStatus.description:
The `Status` type defines a logical error model that is suitable for
different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs. It is
used by [gRPC](https://github.com/grpc). Each `Status` message contains
three pieces of data: error code, error message, and error details.

You can find out more about this error model and how to work with it in the
[API Design Guide](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/errors).

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of [google.rpc.Code][google.rpc.Code].

message.description:
A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any
user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the
[google.rpc.Status.details][google.rpc.Status.details] field, or localized by the client.

details.description:
A list of messages that carry the error details.  There is a common set of
message types for APIs to use.

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 broker external aliases can be created in a batch.
Broker Ticker, External alias, Broker External Organization Id are mandatory in all create request.
requests.title: Create Broker External Aliases request

brokerExternalAliases.description: Broker external aliases to be returned.
brokerExternalAliases.title: Broker external aliases

v1BatchRemoveBrokerExternalAliasesReques.title:
The request message for
BrokerExternalAliasAPI.BatchRemoveBrokerExternalAliases.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9050::request-parent-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we have a oneof parent instead --)

id.title:
Aladdin Broker Identifier (Numeric) (Not supported currently).
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9050::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this refers to the id of the broker which is part of the oneof parent --)

brokerTicker.title:
Broker ticker.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9050::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this refers to the id of the broker which is part of the oneof parent --)

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 broker external aliases can be deleted in a batch.
Broker Ticker, External alias, Broker External Organization Id are mandatory in all create request.
requests.title: Remove Broker External Alias request

results.description: Broker external aliases that were deleted.
results.title: Broker external aliases

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 broker external aliases can be updated in a batch.
Broker Ticker, Broker Desk Id, External alias, Broker External Organization Id are mandatory in all update requests.
requests.title: Update Broker External Aliases request

brokerExternalAliases.description: Broker external aliases to be returned.
brokerExternalAliases.title: Broker external aliases

brokerId.title:
Aladdin Broker Identifier (Numeric) (Not supported currently).
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9050::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this refers to the id of the broker which is part of the oneof parent --)

brokerTicker.title:
Broker ticker.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9050::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this refers to the broker ticker which is part of the oneof parent --)

requests.description: A maximum of 100 broker external aliases can be validated in a batch.
requests.title: Validate Broker External alias Request

actionType.description: Enum that determines whether the request is a create request or an update request, top perform validation accordingly.
actionType.title: ActionType enum

status.description: The status of the operation in case of failure/success.

brokerExternalAliasValidation.description: Represents the validation associated with the broker external alias records.

v1BrokerExternalAlias.description: It is used to map an Aladdin broker to the aliases by which the broker is known outside of Aladdin®.

id.description:
Resources must have a 'id' field.
Name describes the computer or human assigned resource identifier.
Represents Aladdin Broker Identifier (Numeric), commonly referred to as broker code.

brokerExternalOrganisationId.title:
External organisation.
(-- api-linter: core::0124::required-reference=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because resource it should reference has not been created... --)

alternateInfo1.description: Additional data point to provide data in addition to extern id.

alternateInfo2.description: Additional data point to provide data in addition to extern id.

v1BrokerExternalAliasExtendedQuery.description: The query required to perform a filter query.

brokerTickers.description: Broker ticker for which broker desk data is to be retrieved.

v1BrokerExternalAliasQuery.title:
The query required to perform a filter query.
(-- api-linter: core::0123::resource-annotation=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because the id field includes a `google.api.resource` annotation.... --)

loadDefunct.description: Load Defunct Flag - If true , will load all (including defuncts) , else will only load non defunct data.

brokerExternalAliasExtendedQuery.description: Broker External alias Extended Query containing additional filters on desk data.

filterType.description: Enum to determine the type of filter being performed - Basic/ Advanced.

v1CreateBrokerExternalAliasRequest.title:
The request message for BrokerExternalAliasAPI.CreateBrokerExternalAlias.
(-- api-linter: core::0133::request-parent-required=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this is a top-level
 resource --)

brokerExternalAliasQuery.description: Query used to filter broker external alias, such as broker ticker.
brokerExternalAliasQuery.title: Filter Broker External Aliases Query

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of BrokerExternalAliases to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified i.e 0, then complete list of
BrokerExternalAliases will be returned.

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous 'FilterBrokerExternalAliases' call.
Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'FilterBrokerExternalAliases' must match the call that provided the page
token.

brokerExternalAliases.description: Broker external aliases to be returned.
brokerExternalAliases.title: Broker external aliases

nextPageToken.description:
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

error.description: The error result of the operation in case of failure or cancellation.

output.description: The normal response of the operation in case of success.

v1UpdateBrokerExternalAliasRequest.title:
The request message for BrokerExternalAliasAPI.UpdateBrokerExternalAlias.
(-- api-linter: core::0134::request-mask-required=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: Update masks are not being used --)

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.investment_operations.reference_data.bro: This grants access to all endpoints in the investment_operations.reference_data.broker.v1.BrokerExternalAlias API
scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.investment_operations.reference_data.bro: This grants access to all endpoints in the investment_operations.reference_data.broker.v1.BrokerExternalAlias API
scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
